items.title: This Anker 100W 3-port GaN Prime charger is half the size of Apple’s, now down to one of its lowest prices at $45
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find Anker’s official storefront offering its 100W 3-port Prime charger for $45.49 shipped. Originally priced at $85, this USB-C charger has more recently hovered around $70 on Amazon. Today’s deal drops it by $25, bringing it within just $3.50 of the lowest price we’ve seen there. It briefly hit $35 at Best Buy during last year’s Prime Day, which only a few were able to grab before it sold out. It’s now fetching one of the best prices we’ve tracked, making this a great time to cash in if you’ve been wanting to replace a bulky old charger with something compact.

items.title: 20 pct of mammals at risk of extinction in South Africa, Lesotho and Eswatini: report
items.summary: JOHANNESBURG, Jan. 21 (Xinhua) -- About 20 percent of mammals in South Africa, Lesotho and Eswatini are threatened with extinction, and a further 12 percent are classified as near threatened, according to the 2025 Regional Mammal Red List of Threatened Species released Wednesday. While still relatively rare, we have seen a few chances to save on Apple’s latest USB-C Magic Mouse in the classic white color. The black model though, deals are very hard to come by in new condition – Best Buy does, however, have “excellent” condition open-box units sitting down at 37% off right now.

items.title: Lenovo’s AMD-powered Yoga 7 2-in-1 2K OLED touchscreen Copilot+ PC is $400 off today
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Best Buy that gets you Lenovo’s Yoga 7 2-in-1 laptop for $549.99 shipped. This is regularly a $950 notebook, which is now seeing a straight-up $400 discount. Discounts on this 14-inch model have been few and far between since its debut, and it only saw its first big markdown earlier this month as part of a very limited Deals of the Day offer. Today’s deal lands it within just $50 of that price, making this a great time to cash in and snag one if you’re in the market for a new laptop. It’s a feature-packed unit with things like an OLED panel, and you can get more details below.
